description: There are plenty of options in downtown Healdsburg and the town of Windsor—both within a 15 minute drive of the wedding site—but hotels will fill up fast. Book something now!
It’s wine country, which means there is some of the best farm-to-table eats around from grab’n’go picnics to 5-course tasting menus.
You had me at Merlot! The Dry Creek Valley area and Sonoma County are home to some of the best wineries in California (and the world).
